title: Leo Pink Serving Spoon
description: An essential cooking tool which adds colour to your kitchen, thats the pink Leo serving spoon! The soft-touch rubber handle ensures a comfortable grip when youre scooping up your ingredients to create a mouth-watering plate. Thanks to the silicone body you dont need to worry about scratching delicate cookware. When youre done just put it in the dishwasher and hang it from a hook for easy access.Comfortable gripSafe for use with non-stick cookwareClean, classic designMade of nylon
